other_title: 100-Man no Inochi no Ue ni Ore wa Tatteiru (Japanese)
100万の命の上に俺は立っている (Japanese)
plot: Third-year junior high school student Yosuke Yotsuya is a reasonable kid but he doesn't have any friends. Suddenly, Yosuke is blown away into another world. Now the guy who avoided fights with his female classmates and loved being alone is supposed to be a hero, somehow. (from manga)
